remarks: Swap 1st and 2nd members of lattice join.  Frequently-used special case of ~ latj32 for atoms.  (Contributed by NM, 4-Jun-2012.)
statement:
hlatjcom.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
hlatjcom.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
hlatj12 $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( P e. A /\ Q e. A /\ R e. A ) ) -> ( P .\/ ( Q .\/ R ) ) = ( Q .\/ ( P .\/ R ) ) ) $.
